text: Katherine Marie Heigl (born November 24, 1978 in Washington, D.C.) is an American actress, film producer and model. Her notable movies and television programs are Under Siege 2: Dark Territory, Knocked Up, Bride of Chucky and Grey's Anatomy. She began her career as a child model. ==References== Category:Actors from Washington, D.C. Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1978 births Category:Living people
title: Katherine Heigl
